Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • gvprojects.chess.model.Model
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

extends java.lang.Object
implements gvprojects.chess.model.IChessModel
    Version:
    March 14, 2013
    Author:
    Justin Rohr

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Model()
      Constructor that creates a chess board, fills it with pieces, and sets the starting player.

      Returns the current player who is moving

      void undoLastMove(gvprojects.chess.model.Move m, gvprojects.chess.model.Player p)

        public void move(gvprojects.chess.model.Move m)
